概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

com.sun.tools.javac.v8.code
类 Code

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.javac.v8.code.Code
所有已实现的接口：
ByteCodes, TypeTags
public class Code
extends java.lang.Object
implements ByteCodes, TypeTags

An internal structure that corresponds to the code attribute of methods in a classfile. The class also provides some utility operations to generate bytecode instructions.

嵌套类摘要
static class Code.Chain
          A chain represents a list of unresolved jumps.

The current stacksize.

public int nextreg
The next available register.

defined

public Bits defined

stackdiff

public static final int[] stackdiff
How opcodes affect the stack size. Opcodes with stackdiff value -999 need to be teated specially. Opcodes with stackdiff value < -1000 are jumps after which code is dead.
